Secure the base.sentence: The technician prepares the necessary securing materials.
Secure the base.subject: The technician
Secure the base.tools: securing materials such as straps or clamps

Secure the base.sentence: The technician positions the securing materials around the base.
Secure the base.subject: The technician
Secure the base.object: the securing materials around the base

Secure the base.sentence: The technician tightens the securing materials to ensure stability.
Secure the base.subject: The technician

Secure the base.sentence: The technician inspects the secured base for any movement or instability.
Secure the base.subject: The technician

Secure the base.sentence: The technician documents the completion of the securing process.

Secure the base.object: the completion of the securing process
